workflow.name: Automate & publish video ad campaigns with NanoBanana, Seedream, GPT-4o, Veo 3
workflow.description:
![Workflow Screenshot](https://www.dr-firas.com/n8n-Seedream.png)

# üí• Automate video ads with NanoBanana, Seedream 4, ChatGPT Image and Veo 3

### Who is this for?
This template is designed for **marketers, content creators, and e-commerce brands** who want to automate the creation of professional ad videos at scale. It‚Äôs ideal for teams looking to generate consistent, high-quality video ads for social media without spending hours on manual design, editing, or publishing.

### What problem is this workflow solving? / Use case
Creating video ads usually requires multiple tools and a lot of time: writing scripts, designing product visuals, editing videos, and publishing them across platforms.  
This workflow **automates the entire pipeline** ‚Äî from idea to ready-to-publish ad video ‚Äî ensuring brands can quickly test campaigns and boost engagement without production delays.

### What this workflow does
1. **Generates ad ideas** from Telegram input (text + product image).  
2. **Creates product visuals** using multiple AI image engines:  
   - üåä **Seedream 4.0** (realistic visuals)  
   - üçå **NanoBanana** (image editing & enhancement)  
   - ü§ñ **ChatGPT Image / GPT-4o** (creative variations)  
3. **Produces cinematic video ads** with **Veo 3** based on AI-generated scripts.  
4. **Merges multiple short clips** into a polished final ad.  
5. **Publishes automatically** to multiple platforms (TikTok, Instagram, LinkedIn, X, Threads, Facebook, Pinterest, Bluesky, YouTube) via **Blotato**.  
6. **Stores metadata and results** in Google Sheets & Google Drive for easy tracking.  
7. **Notifies you via Telegram** with the video link and copy.

### Setup
1. **Connect your accounts** in n8n:
   - Telegram API (for input and notifications)  
   - Google Drive + Google Sheets (storage & tracking)  
   - Kie AI API (Seedream + Veo 3)  
   - Fal.ai API (NanoBanana + video merging)  
   - OpenAI (for script and prompt generation)  
   - Blotato API (for social publishing)  
2. **Prepare a Google Sheet** with brand info and settings (product name, category, features, offer, website URL).  
3. **Deploy the workflow** and connect your Telegram bot to start sending ad ideas (photo + caption).  
4. **Run the workflow** ‚Äî it will automatically generate images, create videos, and publish to your chosen channels.

### How to customize this workflow to your needs
- **Brand customization**: Adjust the Google Sheet values to reflect your brand‚Äôs offers and product features.  
- **Platforms**: Enable/disable specific Blotato nodes depending on which platforms you want to publish to.  
- **Video style**: Edit the AI agent‚Äôs system prompt to control tone, format, and transitions (cinematic, playful, modern, etc.).  
- **Notifications**: Adapt Telegram nodes to send updates to different team members or channels.  
- **Storage**: Change the Google Drive folder IDs to store generated videos and images in your preferred location.  

This workflow lets you **go from idea ‚Üí images ‚Üí cinematic ad video ‚Üí auto-published content** in minutes, fully automated.

---
üìÑ **üé• Watch This Tutorial**: [Step by Step](https://youtu.be/E-_8KZ_FSeY)

---
üìÑ **Documentation**: [Notion Guide](https://automatisation.notion.site/Automate-video-ads-with-NanoBanana-Seedream-4-ChatGPT-Image-and-Veo-3-27e3d6550fd9800dbe46e6192bae60a9?source=copy_link)

---

### Need help customizing?
Contact me for consulting and support : [Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/) / [Youtube](https:/https://www.youtube.com/@DRFIRASS)

workflow.name: üí• Automate video ads with NanoBanana, Seedream 4, ChatGPT Image and Veo 3 - VIDE

parameters.content:
# 1Ô∏è‚É£  ‚Üí  Step 1 ‚Äî Generate prompts from Telegram input
## Automate video ads with NanoBanana, Seedream 4, ChatGPT Image and Veo 3 (By Dr. Firas)
### What problem is this workflow solving? / Use case
Creating video ads usually requires multiple tools and a lot of time: writing scripts, designing product visuals, editing videos, and publishing them across platforms.  
This workflow **automates the entire pipeline** ‚Äî from idea to ready-to-publish ad video ‚Äî ensuring brands can quickly test campaigns and boost engagement without production delays.

parameters.text:
=Your task is to create an image prompt following the system guidelines.  
Ensure that the reference image is represented as **accurately as possible**, including all text elements.  

Use the following inputs:  

- **User‚Äôs description:**  
{{ $json.imagePrompt }}

options.systemMessage:
=You are a helpful assistantROLE: UGC Image Prompt Builder  

GOAL:  
Generate one concise, natural, and realistic image prompt (‚â§120 words) from a given product or reference image. The prompt must simulate authentic UGC (user-generated content) photography.  

RULES:  
You must always create a professional background for the product image. You must never return the image with a plain white or empty background. The background must always enhance and highlight the product in the photo.

- Always output **one JSON object only** with the key:  
  - `image_prompt`: (string with full description)  
- Do **not** add commentary, metadata, or extra keys. JSON only.  
- User node think to be creative

STYLE GUIDELINES:  
- Tone: casual, unstaged, lifelike, handheld snapshot.  
- Camera cues: include at least 2‚Äì3 (e.g., phone snapshot, handheld framing, off-center composition, natural indoor light, soft shadows, slight motion blur, auto exposure, unpolished look, mild grain).  
- Realism: embrace imperfections (wrinkles, stray hairs, skin texture, clutter, smudges).  
- Packaging/Text: preserve exactly as visible. Never invent claims, numbers, or badges.  
- Diversity: if people appear but are unspecified, vary gender/ethnicity naturally; default age range = 21‚Äì38.  
- Setting: default to real-world everyday spaces (home, street, store, gym, office).  
- User node think to be creative
You must always create a professional background for the product image. You must never return the image with a plain white or empty background. The background must always enhance and highlight the product in the photo.

SAFETY:  
- No copyrighted character names.  
- No dialogue or scripts. Only describe scenes.  

OUTPUT CONTRACT:  
- JSON only, no prose outside.  
- Max 120 words in `image_prompt`.  
- Must cover: subject, action, mood, setting, background, style/camera, colors, and text accuracy.  

CHECKLIST BEFORE OUTPUT:  
- Natural handheld tone?  
- At least 2 camera cues included?  
- Product text preserved exactly?  
- Only JSON returned?  

---  

### Example  

Good Example :  
```json
{ "image_prompt": "a young adult casually holding a skincare tube near a bathroom mirror; action: dabs small amount on the back of the hand; mood: easy morning; setting: small apartment bathroom with towel on rack and toothbrush cup; background: professional-looking bathroom scene that enhances the product, never plain white or empty, always styled to highlight the tube naturally; style/camera: phone snapshot, handheld framing, off-center composition, natural window light, slight motion blur, mild grain; colors: soft whites and mint label; text accuracy: keep every word on the tube exactly as visible, no added claims" }

values.content:
=You are an expert ad copywriter for social media campaigns.
Your task: Create compelling ad copy following this exact
structure:
üö® [Attention-grabbing headline with product benefit]
‚úî [Primary offer/benefit]
‚úî [Key product feature/quality]
‚úî [Trust/credibility element]
[Call to action] ‚Üí [website/link]
# Input Variables:
Product Name: {{ $json.productName }}
Product Category: {{ $json.productCategory }}
Main Offer: {{ $json.mainOffer }}
Key Feature 1: {{ $json.keyFeature1 }}
Key Feature 2: {{ $json.keyFeature2 }}
Website URL: {{ $json.websiteURL }}
Rules:
- Keep headline under 35 characters
- Each checkmark line under 40 characters
- Use power words that create urgency
- Include specific product benefits, not generic claims
- CTA must be action-oriented (Shop Now, Get Yours, Claim Offer,
etc.)
- Output ONLY the ad copy text, no explanations
- No quotes around the text
- Maintain the emoji structure exactly as shown

nodes.name: Save Ad Data to Google Sheets

parameters.text: =Url VIDEO :   {{ $('Update URL Final video').first().json['URL FINAL VIDEO'] }}

parameters.content: # 2Ô∏è‚É£  ‚Üí Step 2 ‚Äî Create product images with : üåä Seedream 4.0 +  üçå NanoBanana + ü§ñ ChatGPT image

parameters.text:
=Create a BEFORE/AFTER transformation video prompt using the provided idea.

**Inputs**

- idea : {{ $('Parse Idea Into Prompts').first().json.videoPrompt }}

**Rules**
- The style must be cinematic, visually striking, and optimized for vertical 9:16 TikTok content.
- Explicitly include: BEFORE scene, AFTER scene, TRANSITION style, CAMERA movement, LIGHTING, COLOR PALETTE, and MOOD.
- Default model: `veo3_fast` (unless otherwise specified).
- Output only one valid JSON object.

- The JSON object must contain the following keys: title, final_prompt, final_prompt_2, final_prompt_3.

- Create 3 different scenarios for the same product/topic.

- Place each scenario in a separate key:
final_prompt ‚Üí Scenario 1
final_prompt_2 ‚Üí Scenario 2
final_prompt_3 ‚Üí Scenario 3

- Use the Think tool to review your output

options.systemMessage:
=system_prompt:
  ## SYSTEM PROMPT: Structured Safe Video Prompt Generator
  A - Ask:
    Generate a structured short video prompt for VEO 3 cinematic generation, strictly based on the master schema provided in: {{ $json.json_master }}.
    Write 3 scenarios for 3 short videos (VEO 3), each lasting about 8 seconds.

The first scenario should highlight a visual "problem atmosphere" (e.g., dull colors, lack of energy, flat lighting) that sets the stage for the product to improve the scene.

The second scenario should show a "visual enhancement" instead of a physical transformation (e.g., scene becomes brighter, colors more vibrant, light reflections intensify, foam glows more under sunlight).

The third scenario should show another "creative enhancement" with a different cinematic angle (e.g., abstract visuals like water, foam, or product bottle under glowing light that shifts into a fresh, uplifting ambiance).

- The final result must be a JSON object with exactly four top-level keys:

title ‚Üí summarizes the overall concept.
final_prompt ‚Üí contains Scenario 1.
final_prompt_2 ‚Üí contains Scenario 2.
final_prompt_3 ‚Üí contains Scenario 3.

  G - Guidance:
    role: Creative Director
    output_count: 1
    character_limit: None
    constraints:
      - The output must be valid JSON.
      - The `title` field should contain a short, descriptive and unique title (max 15 words).
      - The `final_prompt`, `final_prompt_2`, and `final_prompt_3` fields must contain a **single-line JSON string** that follows the exact structure of {{ $json.json_master }} with all fields preserved.
      - All final prompts must clearly describe: SCENE, VISUAL ENHANCEMENT (instead of "before/after"), TRANSITION, CAMERA, LIGHTING, PALETTE, STYLE, and SOUND.
      - Do not include people‚Äôs physical traits or body/hair transformations.
      - Avoid sensitive or restricted terms (e.g., frizzy, smooth, body, face, before/after physical changes).
      - The focus must be on cinematic visuals, light, environment, abstract product representation, and positive ambiance.
      - Do not include any explanations, markdown, or extra text ‚Äî only the JSON object.
      - Escape all inner quotes in the `final_prompt` string so it is valid as a stringified JSON inside another JSON.
    tool_usage:
      - Ensure consistent alignment across all fields (camera, lighting, transition, palette, etc.).
      - Maintain full structure even for optional fields (use "none", "", or [] as needed).

  N - Notation:
    format: JSON
    expected_output:
      {
        "title": "A unique short title for the enhancement concept",
        "final_prompt": "Scenario 1 description here...",
        "final_prompt_2": "Scenario 2 description here...",
        "final_prompt_3": "Scenario 3 description here..."
      }

parameters.content:
### üé• Watch This Tutorial

@[youtube](E17rYpMRvgA)

### üì•  [Open full documentation on Notion](https://automatisation.notion.site/Automate-video-ads-with-NanoBanana-Seedream-4-ChatGPT-Image-and-Veo-3-27e3d6550fd9800dbe46e6192bae60a9?source=copy_link)
---
### 1. Set Up OpenAI Connection
#### Get Your API Key
1. Visit the [OpenAI API Keys](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys) page.  
2. Go to [OpenAI Billing](https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/billing/overview).  
3. Add funds to your billing account.  
4. Copy your API key into your **OpenAI credentials** in n8n (or your chosen platform).  

---
### 2. Setup
1. Import this workflow into your n8n instance.  
2. Connect your Google Sheets, Gmail, and Google Calendar credentials. Tutorial: [Configure Your Google Sheets, Gmail, Calendar Credentials](https://youtu.be/fDzVmdw7bNU)  
3. Connect Your Data in Google Sheets. Data must follow this format: [Sample Sheets Data](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1SpahDHWishtviYiivRlShgIi_vtHUFLvtlxcxuXp1XU/copy)  
4. Test the workflow using the **Connected Chat Trigger** node to start conversations with the AI Agent.  

---
### 3. Integrate ü§ñ VEO 3 (Kie) into n8n
1. Sign up or log in to the **Kie (VEO 3)** dashboard.  
2. Go to **API Keys** ‚Üí **Create new key** ‚Üí copy the key (keep it secret).  
3. Base API URL: `https://api.kie.ai/api/v1/veo/generate`.  

---
### 4. Integrate üçå NanoBanana
1. Go to the [NanoBanana API](https://fal.ai/models/fal-ai/nano-banana/edit/api).  
2. Sign in with your **FAL.ai** account.  
3. Create a new API key and copy it.  
4. In n8n, create new credentials ‚Üí **HTTP Header Auth**.  
5. Add header: `Authorization: Bearer <YOUR_API_KEY>`.  

---
### 5. Integrate üåä Seedream 4.0
1. Visit the [Seedream API](https://kie.ai/seedream-api).  
2. Sign in and create an API key from your dashboard.  
3. Base API endpoint: `https://api.kie.ai/api/v1/seedream/generate`.  
4. In n8n, add credentials ‚Üí **HTTP Header Auth** with `Authorization: Bearer <YOUR_API_KEY>`.  

---
### 6. Integrate ü§ñ ChatGPT Image
1. Visit the [ChatGPT Image API documentation](https://docs.kie.ai/4o-image-api/get-4-o-image-details).  
2. Log in with your Kie.ai account.  
3. Generate a new API key.  
4. Base endpoint: `https://api.kie.ai/api/v1/image/generate`.  
5. Add this key in n8n under **HTTP Header Auth** ‚Üí `Authorization: Bearer <YOUR_API_KEY>`.  

---
### 7. Install the Blotato [Blotato](https://blotato.com/?ref=firas) Node in n8n (Community Nodes)
1. In n8n, open **Settings ‚Üí Community Nodes**.  
2. Click **Install**, then add: `@blotato/n8n-nodes-blotato`.  
3. Log in to **Blotato**.  
4. Go to **Settings ‚Üí API Keys**.  
5. In n8n ‚Üí **Credentials ‚Üí New**.  
6. Choose **Blotato API** (provided by the community node you installed).  

---
## üì¨ Need Help or Want to Customize This?
**Contact me for consulting and support:** [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/) / [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@DRFIRASS)
